text:
將肉排與1/2茶匙鹽拌勻。 用1湯匙油炒熟肉排，倒去多餘油份，加入[redacted_name]糖醋骨醬炒勻至熱透。
成份:
黃糖、黑醋、水、蠔油（水、糖、鹽、蠔汁、改性粟米澱粉、色素 E150a）、醬油（水、大豆、鹽、色素 E150a、小麥、高果糖粟米糖漿）、米酒、改性粟米澱粉、色素（E150a）、酸度調節劑（E330、E 331）、香料、穩定劑（E415）。 含大豆、小麥、天然存在亞硫酸鹽。
過敏原:
大豆、小麥、天然存在亞硫酸鹽
trans:
Mix the pork chops with 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Use 1 tablespoon of oil to fry the pork chops, then drain the excess oil. Add [redacted_name] sweet and sour rib sauce and stir until heated through.
Ingredients:
Brown sugar, black vinegar, water, oyster sauce (water, sugar, salt, oyster juice, modified corn starch, colorant E150a), soy sauce (water, soybeans, salt, colorant E150a, wheat, high fructose corn syrup), rice wine, modified corn starch, colorant (E150a), acidity regulators (E330, E331), spices, stabilizers (E415). Contains soybeans, wheat, naturally occurring sulfites.
Allergens:
Soybeans, wheat, naturally occurring sulfites
